getsnguide.step1: Use phone which supprot NFC and go AppStore (iPhone) or Google Play (Android) download "NFC Tools"
getsnguide.step2: Open the App and Approach your card in the App
getsnguide.step3: Copy "Serial number" field (with a key icon next to it)
